Title: We’re Getting Screwed by Our Business Partner
Description:
Today we’ll hear about: 

  • A business owner whose partner does no work but wants the profit 
  • A man trying to decide if offering financing would be immoral 
  • The three signs your business is growing too fast 
  • A man trying to get his father to listen to his business ideas
